COMMENT_TX: $Jeff Kent waited to see if the ball would be caught and was out by a few steps at HP; J.D. Drew knew the ball would fall in so he started running and passed the 3B coach without looking; Paul Lo Duca tagged Kent and then stood to show the ball to HP umpire John Hirschbeck; Lo Duca then turned towards the field to see Drew running at him, so he tagged the second runner as well
$off the top of the camera position in CF; 450 feet
$Nomar Garciaparra left the game due to an injured leg
$Cliff Floyd strained his left Achilles tendon rounding 3B
